nodes.text: The Gertafuu system was a Wild Space star system. The sixth orbital position within the system was occupied by the frigid astronomical object Gertafuu VI. The latter was inhabited by members of the sentient Aqualish and Whiphid species.
The Gertafuu system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed it within grid square S-18.
